The fact connects these events, revealing that the gas outbreaks were actually missile launches, one of which resulted in the crater Ogilvy found.
corrupted_reasoning: This corrupted fact incorrectly states that the gas outbreaks were natural phenomena unrelated to the crater, which contradicts the implied connection between these events in the outline.
